sqlMap.select:
select id, name, description, level, max_hp, attack_min, attack_max, defence, agility, morale, item_id1, item_prop1, item_id2, item_prop2, item_id3, item_prop3, item_id4, item_prop4, item_id5, item_prop5, drop_exp_min, drop_exp_max, drop_money_min, drop_money_max, drop_item_prop, drop_item_level, abort_lost_copper, show_for_mission, name_pinyin, damage, spec_name, is_instance, alias_name, sunder, anti_sunder, seal, anti_seal, poison, anti_poison, brokensoul, anti_brokensoul, slow, anti_slow, rebound, anti_rebound, monster_type from monster
order by $orderByClause$

select id, name, description, level, max_hp, attack_min, attack_max, defence, agility, morale, item_id1, item_prop1, item_id2, item_prop2, item_id3, item_prop3, item_id4, item_prop4, item_id5, item_prop5, drop_exp_min, drop_exp_max, drop_money_min, drop_money_max, drop_item_prop, drop_item_level, abort_lost_copper, show_for_mission, name_pinyin, damage, spec_name, is_instance, alias_name, sunder, anti_sunder, seal, anti_seal, poison, anti_poison, brokensoul, anti_brokensoul, slow, anti_slow, rebound, anti_rebound, monster_type from monster where id = #id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into monster (name, description, level, max_hp, attack_min, attack_max, defence, agility, morale, item_id1, item_prop1, item_id2, item_prop2, item_id3, item_prop3, item_id4, item_prop4, item_id5, item_prop5, drop_exp_min, drop_exp_max, drop_money_min, drop_money_max, drop_item_prop, drop_item_level, abort_lost_copper, show_for_mission, name_pinyin, damage, spec_name, is_instance, alias_name, sunder, anti_sunder, seal, anti_seal, poison, anti_poison, brokensoul, anti_brokensoul, slow, anti_slow, rebound, anti_rebound, monster_type) values (#name:VARCHAR#, #description:VARCHAR#, #level:INTEGER#, #maxHp:INTEGER#, #attackMin:INTEGER#, #attackMax:INTEGER#, #defence:INTEGER#, #agility:INTEGER#, #morale:INTEGER#, #itemId1:INTEGER#, #itemProp1:INTEGER#, #itemId2:INTEGER#, #itemProp2:INTEGER#, #itemId3:INTEGER#, #itemProp3:INTEGER#, #itemId4:INTEGER#, #itemProp4:INTEGER#, #itemId5:INTEGER#, #itemProp5:INTEGER#, #dropExpMin:INTEGER#, #dropExpMax:INTEGER#, #dropMoneyMin:INTEGER#, #dropMoneyMax:INTEGER#, #dropItemProp:VARCHAR#, #dropItemLevel:VARCHAR#, #abortLostCopper:INTEGER#, #showForMission:INTEGER#, #namePinyin:VARCHAR#, #damage:INTEGER#, #specName:VARCHAR#, #isInstance:INTEGER#, #aliasName:VARCHAR#, #sunder:INTEGER#, #antiSunder:INTEGER#, #seal:INTEGER#, #antiSeal:INTEGER#, #poison:INTEGER#, #antiPoison:INTEGER#, #brokensoul:INTEGER#, #antiBrokensoul:INTEGER#, #slow:INTEGER#, #antiSlow:INTEGER#, #rebound:INTEGER#, #antiRebound:INTEGER#, #monsterType:INTEGER#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

update monster
id = #record.id:INTEGER#
name = #record.name:VARCHAR#

level = #record.level:INTEGER#
